shrimp.name: If
shrimp.author: rconstruct

input.name: x
input.description: Condition value, true if non-zero, false if zero

input.name: true_val
input.description: Input value to pass through if x is true
input.type: string vector point normal color float

input.name: false_val
input.description: Input value to pass through if exp is false
input.type: string vector point normal color float

output.name: out
output.description: if condition is true then this is true_val, otherwise it is false_val
output.type: string vector point normal color float

shrimp.usage: The value of "x" is a float that determines which input value is passed to the output. Any non-zero value is regarded as true.
